first_translate: wow...
each tent has  its family crest embroidered on it.
I wonder which house that red one belongs to.
your grace?
the weather is...
...terribly hot today.

hangle: 수도가 헤일론 사람한테는 좀 덥긴 하지.
first_translate: it’s quite warm for someone from heilon.
you’re not participating, are you?
nope.
but I’ll watch as all of you show off your skills.
showing off our skills...

hangle: 너도 더우니 체력 떨어지기 전에 상급 마물 하나 잡고 끝내라.
first_translate: since you must also feel hot, why don’t we end this by hunting down just one higher-class monster?

hangle: 사냥 대회에 상급 마물이 있을 리 없잖아요.
first_translate: higher-class monsters won’t appear at something like this competition.

hangle: 황족이랑 귀족들이 반쯤 즐기자고 만든 대회에 그런 위험한 게 있으면…
first_translate: if there were such dangerous creatures here, then how could royalty or nobles--
excuse me,
duke haylon.

hangle: 잠시 피오나 영애와 이야기를 나누어도 될까요?
first_translate: may I have a moment with lady fiona?
lady livia?
pardon?
do you mean the monsters I hunt during the competition?!
that's right.

hangle: 영애가 잡은 마물을 제게 바쳐 주시겠어요?
first_translate: could you give them to me after catching them?
why would you want those?
well,
it’s because I know you will win first place.

hangle: 믿어 주시는 건 감사하지만 대회는 아직 시작도…
first_translate: while I appreciate your confidence in me, the competition hasn’t even started yet--
there’s no need to be so humble.

hangle: 전 영애가 줄곧 헤일론의 성벽을 수호했다는 사실을 알고 있었거든요.
first_translate: I already knew about what happened back at the castle walls of heilon.
really?

hangle: 전 피오나 영애가 우승한다는 데 걸겠어요.
first_translate: I bet my money on you winning first prize.

hangle: 보아하니 다른 우승 후보인 시그렌 황자 전하께서는 별 의욕도 없어 보이시고.
first_translate: and judging by his attitude, it doesn’t seem like prince sigren wants to participate either.
prince sigren...

hangle: 아까 팔자 좋게 하품이나 하고 있었지…
first_translate: all he did was yawn earlier...
didn’t he say he had some girl he liked?!

hangle: 그럼 마물을 바쳐 달라는 건 무슨 의도인가요?
first_translate: then why do you ask me to hand over the monsters I catch?

hangle: 그건 보통 기사들나 영식들이 귀족 영애에게 호감을 표현하는 방법일 텐데…
first_translate: isn’t that usually how knights express their feelings toward noble ladies they fancy?

hangle: 안 그러면 황태자 전하께서 제게 마물을 바칠 테니까요.
first_translate: or else, his highness the crown prince might offer them to me instead.

hangle: 우승자인 제가 리비아 영애에게 마물을 바친다면…
first_translate: in other words, if you gave them to me when you win first place,

hangle: 황태자 전하는 자존심이 상해서라도 마물을 바치지 않을 거란 거군요.
first_translate: his pride wouldn’t allow him to present any more beasts to me himself.
beastie
that’s correct.

hangle: 절 도우면 영애가 사교계에서 입지를 다질 수 있도록 도와줄게요.
first_translate: help me out, and I'll help solidify your position within high society.
how?

hangle: 영애는 시그렌 전하를 지지하는 헤일론 가문의 사람.
first_translate: as a member of house haylon, you support prince sigren.
this means her majesty the empress...

hangle: 절대로 영애를 곱게 보고 있지 않을 거랍니다.
first_translate: ...won’t think very highly of you.
to put it bluntly,

hangle: 사교계에서 영애를 비웃음거리로 만들기 위해 단단히 벼르고 계시죠.
first_translate: she plans to make fun of you before everyone in high society.
so let me help you.

hangle: 이래 봬도 사교계에서 제 입지는 나름 탄탄하답니다.
first_translate: my standing among the aristocrats isn’t bad myself.

hangle: 확실히 나 같은 경우는 사교계에서 공격당할 수 있는 약점이 많지.
first_translate: true, there are many things people can use against me in high society.
not only am I adopted into house haylon, but I’m also the successor.

hangle: 거기다 난 어차피 황태자와는 언제라도 적대할 수 있는 위치였으니,
first_translate: on top of that, since I’ve always been in opposition to the crown prince anyway,

hangle: 차라리 중립인 프리실라 가와 친분을 쌓는 것도 나쁘지 않아.
first_translate: it’d actually be good to build ties with neutral houses like priscilla.
alright!
I promise to turn you into the person...

hangle: 사냥 대회에서 가장 많은 마물을 받은 사람으로 만들어 드릴게요.
first_translate: ...who receives the most monsters hunted during the competition.
ahaha.
I look forward to seeing that happen!
they really came prepared...

hangle: 귀족과 황족들은 사냥 대회라도 호위를 잔뜩 붙이고 다니는구나.
first_translate: nobility and royal families still bring bodyguards along, even to competitions like these.
061(sigren probably brought some too.)
lady fiona!
it’s dangerous!
oh,
can fire cause problems around here?

hangle: 헤일론은 울창한 나무가 별로 없어서 괜찮았는데,
first_translate: back home in heilon, there weren’t enough trees to worry about fires breaking out,

hangle: 여기서는 큰 화재가 일어날 수도 있겠어.
first_translate: but here, it could lead to a huge blaze.
fiona halyon...
I didn’t realize she possessed abilities like that!

hangle: 이대로 있으면 저 작은 영애에게 지게 될 게 뻔하다.
first_translate: at this rate, I’ll definitely lose to that little brat.

hangle: 그러면 사교계에서 내 꼴이 뭐가 돼!
first_translate: what will become of me in high society?!
let’s move somewhere else.
where do you plan on going?
outside the designated area.

hangle: 하지만 그곳에는 상급 마물들이 서식하고 있을 가능성이 높습니다!
first_translate: but there may be higher-class monsters living beyond that point!
let’s go!
I can’t afford to lose now.
take this!
you insolent wench!
I shall teach you a lesson!
